summary: A petty robbery spirals into a tense hostage situation after three gunmen hold up a diner that's a front for the mob.
cast: Forest Whitaker|Jonathan Bennett|Nikki Reed|Jessica Szohr|Ray Liotta|Marton Csokas|Stephen Lang|Common|Sean Faris|Michael Chiklis|Max Beesley|Gabriel Jarret|Jordan Belfi|Deborah Twiss|Ronald Guttman|Ashley Kirk|Jim Ford|Alex Ziwak|Greg Nutcher|Jon Lee Brody|Adam Moryto|Jay Ferraro|Gary Betsworth|Peter Vouras|Paul Jude Letersky|Cameron Denny|Frank Vollero|Rachel Konstantin|Joslyn Stabile|Vince Weir|Pamela Burrus|Al Varvella|Stephen Crain|Vincent Weir|Rhea Ruggiero
title: El asedio
